comments:
Toggling on logical structures using the following code snippet with the list2 and map variables expanded in the variables view causes multiple of the supplied error.

Code:
public class Java5 {
 public static void main(String[] args) {
  List<String> list = new ArrayList<String>();
  list.add("one");
  list.add("two");
  list.add("three");
  List<Object> list2 = new ArrayList<Object>();
  list2.add(1);
  list2.add(23);
  Map<String, Integer> map = new HashMap<String, Integer>();
  map.put("one", 1);
  map.put("two", 2);
  map.put("three", 3);
  String[] strarray = {"1", "22", "333", "4444", "55555"};
  System.out.println("end"); //breakpoint
 }
}
